inclusion.criterion: follow-up visits, a reduced complexity at the visits, and an intervention that is additional to standard care but with no placebo control
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patients managed at the Department of Respiratory Medicine at Orebro University Hospital or primary health care centers in Region Orebro County, with a doctor's diagnosis of COPD
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no International Classification of Diseases (ICD) codes for cardiovascular diseases and no present beta-blocker therapy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: atrioventricular (AV) block II or III without pacemaker, atrial fibrillation or flutter, clinical signs of or previously known cardiovascular disease
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: systolic blood pressure < 90, severe asthma, present beta-blocker therapy or ongoing COPD exacerbation
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Patient refused right heart cath for evaluation of response to sildenafil but tolerated an inpatient trial without hypotension.
